scripts.copy:sample: yarn timing:start copy:sample && cp sample_data.json dist/ && yarn timing:stop copy:sample
scripts.copy:bootstrap: yarn timing:start copy:bootstrap && yarn clean:bootstrap && mkdir dist/css && cp -R node_modules/bootstrap/dist/css/* dist/css && yarn timing:stop copy:bootstrap
scripts.copy: yarn copy:sample && yarn copy:bootstrap && yarn copy:css
scripts.build:js: yarn timing:start webpack && webpack && yarn timing:stop webpack
scripts.style: yarn timing:start eslint && eslint script src test && yarn timing:stop eslint
scripts.test: yarn style && yarn timing:start mocha && mocha && yarn timing:stop mocha
scripts.deploy:gh-pages: yarn timing:start deploy:gh-pages && yarn clean:gh-pages && node ./script/deploy.js && yarn timing:stop deploy:gh-pages
scripts.deploy: yarn assets && yarn deploy:gh-pages && yarn deploy:timing-data
